text: new idea for the extension - when you hit `shift+tab` in a code editor, a unicorn flys by with sparkles and stuff. Because auto indenting/beautifying is magic.
nah, it will be if we replace to 4spaces instead 2
See we're trying to do this rarely seen miracle of not getting hundreds of 1 stars lol
Link to the beta version has been sent out to those who showed interest. Let us know if you are interested in testing, this beta will auto update over time.
